ideas.headerImageDescription: Outlandish creations from pixelated unicorns to drumbeat waveforms to levitating tacos to buckets of rainbows.
ideas.gettingStartedText: Scratchda yangi foydalanuvchimisiz? Unda Boshlash uchun qo'llanmasini ko'ring
ideas.gettingStartedImageDescription: An illustrated boy plants his flag on top of a freshly painted mountaintop.
ideas.activityGuidesText: Scratch bilan nima yasashni xohlaysiz? Har bir faoliyat uchun o'quv qo'llanmasidan orqali  harakat qilishingiz, Coding Cards to'plamini yuklab olishingiz yoki Educator Guide ni ko'rib chiqishingiz mumkin.
ideas.animateANameDescription: Ismingizdagi harflarni, bosh harfni yoki sevimli so'zingizni jonlantiring.
ideas.animateANameImageDescription: The name ANYA in all caps and blocked letters is poised to wiggle
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: Animatsiya bilan hayotga belgilarni olib kiring.
ideas.animateACharacterImageDescription: An taco with a wand, wizard cap and flowing white beard floats enchantingly in low-Earth orbit.
ideas.makeMusicDescription: Musiqa asbobini tanlang, ovoz qo‘shing va ijro etish uchun tugmalarni bosing.
ideas.makeMusicImageDescription: Strings vibrate on an illustrated Gibson explorer.
ideas.createAStoryDescription: Qahramonlar tanlang, suhbat qo‘shing va hayotiy hikoyangizni jonlantiring.
ideas.createAStoryImageDescription: A wizard beckons a traveling witch towards a distant castle.
ideas.chaseGameImageDescription: A happy interactive octopus passes over a star.
ideas.videoSensingDescription: Video Sensing ilova loyihasidan foydalanish bilan ta'sir o'tkazing.
ideas.videoSensingImageDescription: A virtual hand dodges a spurt of flame in an attempt to pet a dragon.
ideas.cardsTitle: Coding Cards ning Butun Kolleksiyasini oling
ideas.cardsText: Scratch Coding Cards bilan siz ta'sirchan o'yinlarni, hikoyalarni, musiqa, animatsiya va undanam ko'prolarini yaratishni o'rganishingiz mumkin!
ideas.cardsIllustrationDescription: An assortment of fun, animated characters and objects leap out of a stack of cards.
ideas.starterProjectsText: Starter Projects bilan ijro etishingiz va o'zingizning shaxsiy ijodingizni yasash uchun ularga aralshtirishingiz mumkin.
ideas.starterProjectsImageDescription: An illustration of the Scratch Code Editor.
ideas.desktopEditorBody: Loyihalarni internetsiz yaratish uchun Scratch ilovasini yuklab olishingiz mumkin.
ideas.desktopEditorBodyHTML: Loyihalarni internetsiz yaratish uchun Scratch ilovasini yuklab olishingiz mumkin.
ideas.questionsBody: Yana savollaringiz bormi? Savol-javob sahifasini ko‘ring yoki skriptlar orqali yordam forumiga tashrif buyuring.
ideas.questionsBodyHTML: Yana savollaringiz bormi? <faq>Savol-javob</faq> sahifasini ko‘ring yoki <forum>skriptlar orqali yordam forumiga</forum> tashrif buyuring.
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: Istalgan qahramonni tanlang va u bilan parvoz qiling!
ideas.MakeItFlyImageDescription: The scratch cat flies over the skyline. Alongside a flying taco.
ideas.RaceDescription: Ikki qahramon bir-biri bilan poygalashadigan o‘yin yarating.
ideas.HideAndSeekDescription: Paydo bo‘lib, yo‘qolib qoladigan qahramonlar bilan berkinmachoq o‘yinini yarating.
ideas.FashionDescription: Qahramonlaringizga turli kiyim-kechaklarni kiydirish mumkin bo‘lgan o‘yin yarating.
ideas.PongDescription: Sakraydigan to‘p bilan ovozli, ochkoli va turli effektlarga boy o‘yin yarating.
ideas.PongImageDescription: A ball bounces off a digital paddle.
ideas.ImagineDescription: Hamma narsani imkoni bor boʻlgan dunyoni tasavvur qiling.
ideas.ImagineImageDescription: A girl stands proudly in front of a thought bubble as big as the Earth and as intricate as butterfly wings.
ideas.DanceDescription: Animatsiyali raqs sahnasini yarating va jonli musiqa va raqs harakatlarini qo‘shing.
ideas.CatchDescription: Osmondan tushayotgan narsalarni tutib, yig‘ib oladigan o‘yin yarating.
ideas.VirtualPetDescription: Yeb-icha oladigan, o‘ynaydigan interaktiv uy hayvonlarini yarating.
